name: Goal 2
description: Engaging inspired and multi-competent individuals in a flexible work environment

objectives.name: Objective 1: To establish a flexible work arrangement that facilitates and responds to the novel and future work environment by 2021

strategies.name: Create flexible staff contracting arrangements to include: part-time, secondment, flexi hours, job sharing among others, and its applicable reward system.
Deepen adoption of technology solutions as an enabler of flexibility in the workplace.
